page.description: Generate a SQL Drop Index statement for the table passed in.
page.syntax: SQL_Statement as C = GenerateDropIndexStatement as C (Owner as C, Table as C, Index as C)

argument.name: SQL_Statement
argument.description: An add user group statement appropriate for the database.

page.discussion: The .GenerateDropIndexStatement() method returns the SQL statement that will delete the specified table index.
page.example: dim conn as SQL::Connection conn.open("{A5API=Access,FileName='C:\Program Files\A5V8\MDBFiles\Alphasports.mdb',UserName='Admin'}") ? conn.GenerateDropIndexStatement("", "Customer", "foo") = "DROP INDEX foo ON Customer"
